post.author: 강윤정
post.content:
The issue was the version of .Net Web Service Extension (WSE) Library.
We changed the libraray back to ver 1.0 from 2.0 and it worked out! The way of soap message creation was different between WSE 1.0 and 2.0 and my WebSphere environment was ok with WSE 1.0 library.
What I guess is this:
The latest version WSE 2.0 is based on the standard of "oasis 2004-01" while the WebSphere test environment 5.1 I tried is based on "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/06/" so the WebSphere may have not understood the new "oasis" way of tags or the naming space of the tags.
The initial version WSE 1.0 is based on 2002-07 from xmlsoap.org so the WebSphere may stil cover this backward thing.
I appreciate all your interests and suggestion on this again.
post.title: Found the issue, Thank you for everyone interested in this.
